WRITING.TITLE: Fps issue
WRITING.TEXT: Hi there! Im playing black desert mobile on bluestacks 4 but i have a fps problem as the title says I start with 60 fps but after a few minutes playing it gets capped by 30 fps, the weird thing here is when i go to sleepmode or change a graphic setting it goes back to 60fps but then after a few seconds it falls back to 30 again? I #8217;ve tried a lot of settings in bluestacks bdm itself and nvidia control panel but cant find any solutions. Maybee somone has the same problem and solved it? Thanks!
